properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 3:17AM EST until January 5 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches
expected. The highest amounts are expected over higher terrain.

* WHERE...Northern Coos and Southern Coos Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 3 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread Coos County later this
morning and continue into tonight. Slippery road conditions will
be likely.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM EST SUNDAY
